entry.title: Country Butter Rusks 500g | Camphill Village
entry.summary:
Vendor: Camphill Village
Type: Health food
Price: 62.50

Camphill Village West Coast's Country Butter Rusks (500g) is sustainably-sourced and made by a local community for intellectually-challenged adults.

  • This is a wholesome snack packed with crunchy, yummy taste using stone-ground flour, a wide selection of seeds and nuts, honey, cultured butter and free range eggs
  • Contains no preservatives using only wholesome goodness 
  • The revenue that is made from these sales goes towards sustaining Camphill Village West Coast (a sustainable, socially-uplifting community established for intellectually challenged adults)
  • Support local, support community and support our planet!

Ingredients 

Stone-ground wheat flour, farm cultured milk, farm butter, sugar, bran 16%, oats, coconut, free range eggs, sunflower seeds, linseeds, sesame seeds, pumpkin seeds, baking powder, salt.

Why we support Camphill Village

The revenue that is made from these sales goes towards sustaining Camphill Village West Coast. Camphill Village cares about the environment, sustainability and future generations to come!

Camphill Village West Coast is a sustainable, socially-uplifting community established for intellectually challenged adults, to provide them with the opportunity to live with purpose and dignity. Located on a farm (40 km north of Cape Town), Camphill is set in a natural farm setting where the residents work in a bakery, dairy, herbal workshop, farm and vegetable gardens to produce quality goods for sale.

entry.title: Ghee (Clarified Butter) | Earth Products
entry.summary:
Vendor: Earth Products
Type: Health food
Price: 95.00

Earth Products' Ghee (230g) is a healthy alternative to ordinary butter and cooking oils.

  • Ghee is clarified butter, meaning that all water and milk solids have been removed, making it perfect for those who are lactose-intolerant or casein-intolerant 
  • Contains no dairy BUT is not vegan-friendly (as it is an animal byproduct)
  • Has a delicious buttery, nutty and slightly sweet flavour 
  • Perfect for Asian and Indian dishes, cooking, frying and baking
  • Loaded with vitamins A, D, E and K
  • Has a high smoke point of 250°C
  • Has a long shelf life
  • Free of trans-fats, preservatives and additives
  • Ethically and humanely sourced from grass-fed cows in the Midlands

Ingredients

Clarified butter

entry.title: Cassava Flour - Gluten-Free Flour For Cooking and Baking
entry.summary:
Vendor: Earth Tribe
Type: Superfoods
Price: 115.00

Earth Tribe's Cassava Flour (1 kg) comes from the whole Cassava root which is a starchy tuber, native to South America, brought to Africa by Portuguese traders in the 16th century. Similar to wheat flour, it's popularly used as a Gluten-free starch.

  • High in fiber and an excellent source of saponins - phytochemicals that help lower unhealthy cholesterol levels in your bloodstream
  • One of the richest sources of carbohydrates and a good source of minerals such as Calcium, Phosphorus, Manganese, Iron and Potassium
  • A high energy source (great for those involved in strenuous physical activities) 
  • An excellent substitute to grains containing gluten 
  • Contains antioxidants
  • Can be consumed by people with sensitive digestive systems and is non-allergenic (for those who are allergic to nut flours)

Ingredients

Cassava Flour.

Directions for use

Use as you would any flour for cooking or baking.

Caution: Should not be eaten raw.
entry.s:tag: Earth Tribe wholesale distributor South Africa

entry.title: Earth Products Non-Irradiated Turmeric Powder (250 g)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Earth Products
Type: Superfoods
Price: 29.00

Turmeric powder is a common culinary spice in Indian cuisine and is also used  in Ayurvedic medicine, fast making its way to the natural health treasure chest! Turmeric has powerful anti-inflammatory and antioxidant properties! Most turmeric found in stores has been irradiated which removes the beneficial therapeutic properties, so make sure that you only use non-irradiated turmeric powder!

Health benefits of turmeric

  • Acts as a digestive aid - helps to stimulate the gall bladder to produce more bile, which is important to break down dietary fat
  • Studies have shown that Curcumin can reduce the growth of cancerous cells and new blood vessels in tumours
  • The powerful anti-inflammatory and oxidative properties of curcumin make it a perfect choice to reduce arthritis symptoms
  • Helps to prevent Alzheimer's and promotes brain and neurotransmitter balance
  • For bronchial asthma stir a teaspoon of the powder in a glass of milk or preferred drink and drink up to 3 times a day
  • Can also be used in DIY skin care products to naturally cleanse, purify and brighten the skin! 
  • Non-irradiated turmeric is a key ingredient in Golden Milk (haldi doodh) - an Ayurvedic health drink

How to use Turmeric Powder

Turmeric powder can be added to food dishes, sauces, soups and drinks like tea and milk! It is best to have on an empty stomach. 

Turmeric Tea - Dissolve 5 grams (about 1 teaspoon) of turmeric powder into boiled water or almond milk. You can also add lemon, honey, ginger and other spices to enhance the flavour of this delicious drink.

Ingredients:

100% Non-irradiated Turmeric Powder

    Disclaimer: This product has not been evaluated by the Medicines Control Council. This medicine is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any illness.

entry.title: Earth Organic Apple Cider Vinegar: With the Mother! (500ml)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Earth Products
Type: Apple Cider Vinegar
Price: 86.50

  • Contains 'the mother' (collagen strands that are not present in most commercial apple cider vinegar)
  • Promotes beautiful skin and vibrant health
  • Removes arterial plaque, bodily toxins and infections
  • Guards against candida, thrush, moulds, bacteria and germs
  • Helps to regulate calcium metabolism
  • Normalises urine pH, relieves bladder infections and the frequent urge to urinate
  • Helps digestion, prevents and relieves acid reflux and heartburn
  • Helps with sore throat, laryngitis, ticklish throat, clears throat congestion and gum infections (use as a gargle)
  • Detoxes the body, reduces bloating & cellulite and helps with weight loss
  • Applied topically, helps with acne, dandruff, athlete's foot, shingles, sunburn and other burns
  • Helps banish itching, dandruff, dry hair and baldness (use as a hair wash or body rinse)
  • Relieves the pain of arthritis and gout by removing crystals and toxins from joints, tissues, organs and the whole body

What is Apple Cider Vinegar (ACV)?

EARTH Apple Cider Vinegar is made from organically grown apples and contains the famous 'Mother' = the collagen strands that help keep making vinegar. These appear as little floaty bits in the vinegar and are essential in maintaining the therapeutic benefits of the Apple Cider Vinegar. They are not usually present in non-organic store-bought apple cider vinegar,  

How to use Apple Cider Vinegar

You can drink Apple Cider Vinegar as is, but most people prefer to dilute it.

This is a good mix:

Add one tablespoon Apple Cider Vinegar,  1/2 juiced lemon and one teaspoon honey or maple syrup into a cup of warm water. Drink first thing in the morning, after working out, or when dehydrated.

You can also add a tablespoon of Apple Cider Vinegar to a 1/2 cup of warm water and sip slowly to relieve indigestion, heartburn or acid reflux. 

Topically, dilute one tablespoon Apple Cider Vinegar and sponge onto itchy skin, athlete's foot or other skin conditions, or use as a hair rinse for scalp problems or dandruff. 

    Disclaimer: This product has not been evaluated by the Medicines Control Council. This medicine is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any illness.
entry.s:tag: Apple Cider Vinegar to lose weght

entry.title: Cannaco CBD Gummies: A delicious dose of CBD!
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cannaco
Type: CBD Oil
Price: 136.00

Cannaco's CBD Gummies are a delicious way to get your daily dose of CBD. Each gummy contains 4 mg CBD oil and there are 15 gummies in a packet (5 days at 3 gummies per day). (90 g)

  • 15 delicious CBD infused gummies in a packet
  • Each gummy delivers a 4 mg Certified USDA Organic Broad Spectrum CBD dose right into your Endocannabinoid System
  • Three gummies per day provide the recommended dose of 12 mg
  • Cannaco CBD oil is free from any herbicides, pesticides, GMO products, solvents or any other form of additive
  • Contains THC at the legal limit of <0.3% (will cause no “high”)
  • CBD helps maintain an optimal level of homeostasis
  • Reduces inflammation, chronic pain, insomnia, headaches and other serious diseases/health issues

Ingredients

Certified USDA Organic Broad Spectrum CBD, Sugar, Glucose Syrup, Gelatine, Corn Starch, Acidity Regulators, Flavouring, Colourants and Glazing Agents

Glazing Agents: Beeswax (E); Candelilla wax (E); Carnauba wax (E)
Acidity Regulators: Citric Acid

Flavouring and Colorants: Natural and artificial food colouring and flavouring

Directions for use

We recommend to start with 1 gummy if you are sensitive or new to CBD edibles, building up to 3 gummies per day. As all people, and their health needs, are different, the recommended dosage of CBD oil will vary from person to person, depending on their constitution, lifestyle and needs. 

For kids: start with half gummy (max one).

Note: Should not be taken by those with ADD/ADHD or sensory disorders due to sugar content. Instead, we recommend using Pure MCT CBD Oil - Certified USDA! (15ml) or Pure MCT CBD Oil - Certified USDA! (30ml).
entry.s:tag: Cannaco Wholesale Distributor in South Africa

entry.title: Cannaco CBD Cookies - a delicious, therapeutic snack! (Vanilla)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cannaco
Type: CBD Oil
Price: 136.00

Cannaco's Organic Vanilla CBD Cookies contains 15 servings of relaxation and wellness!

  • Reduces stress, aches, inflammation, insomnia, anxiety and ADHD
  • Broad Terpene Spectrum CBD Oil paired with MCT (Medium Chain Triglycerides)
  • Contains THC at the legal limit of <0.3% (will cause no “high”). THC is synergistic with the other cannabinoids in the formula and enhances their value and absorption
  • Cannaco CBD oil is Co2 extracted and completely free from any herbicides, pesticides, GMO products, solvents or any other form of additive. 
  • Works with your body's own endocannibinoid system to heal and support optimum health

  • Strength: 15 Biscuits // 150mg Broad Spectrum CBD // 10mg per Biscuit

Ingredients

Certified Broad Spectrum CBD, Salt, Butter, Sugar, Vanilla Essence, Wheat Flour, Potassium Sorbate, Baking Soda, Eggs, Baking Powder.

How to use

Start with 1/2 biscuit and wait for 10 – 15 minutes before increasing the dosage. Max recommended dosage – 1 Biscuit. Each biscuit contains 10mg Broad Spectrum CBD.

Kids: max a quarter of a biscuit (preferably before bed).

Store in a cool dry place.

entry.title: Jugo Beans - Powerhouse Savoury Legumes
entry.summary:
Vendor: Earth Tribe
Type: Superfoods
Price: 103.50

Earth Tribe's Jugo Beans (1 kg) or Bambara groundnuts, are nutritional legumes packed with protein, fibre, B vitamins, irons and potassium, and low in fat. Highly underrated and superior to other beans and legumes.

  • Jugo Beans have such a powerful natural savoury flavour with a hint of sweetness, that you don’t need to add anything but salt to enjoy
  • Rich in phytochemicals, they help lower the risk of heart disease and contain a wide range of cancer-fighting plant chemicals
  • A rich source of soluble fibre and saponins - phytochemicals that help lower unhealthy cholesterol levels in your bloodstream
  • When consumed, they slow down the release of sugar to give you a steady supply of (glucose) energy

Ingredients

Jugo Beans.

Directions for use

To cook, first wash and submerge well with fresh water to soak overnight. Before cooking, drain well and rinse again. For every 1 cup of beans, add 2 cups of water or more – as they cook, they make a thick, soupy brown sauce that can be used in soups and stews for a savoury burst of flavour. Bring to the boil, then lower the heat to simmer – covered – for around 1 to 1 ½ hours. Only add salt at the very end, as salt tends to harden beans while they are cooking.

Eat plain as a snack, or add to rice for a pilaf, or roast in the oven, or add to your favourite tomato sauce for a delicious protein b
entry.s:tag: Earth Tribe wholesale distributor South Africa
